rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, or other Q2 cues.
This is a neutral statement of quantity.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual information/scale but contains no explicit calming cue.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports factual data (size/location of infected flock), not capabilities, preparedness, or safeguards.
